blogPost.excerpt: Google Analytics meets intelligent algorithms: find hidden conversion opportunities in your Google Analytics data. A tool that analyzes your data and shows exactly how to improve your conversion rates. Offers audits and 24/7 monitoring of Google Analytics.
blogPost.body: Google Analytics meets intelligent algorithms: find hidden conversion opportunities in your Google Analytics data. A tool that analyzes your data and shows exactly how to improve your conversion rates. Offers audits and 24/7 monitoring of Google Analytics.
blogPost.title: Convertmind - Google analytics monitoring & audits to increase conversions
blogPost.author: Gijs Wierda

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics数据中找到隐藏的转化机会。一个分析您的数据并准确显示如何提高您的转化率的工具。提供对Google Analytics的审计和24/7监控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析监测和审计，以提高转换率。

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics數據中找到隱藏的轉化機會。一個分析您的數據並準確顯示如何提高您的轉化率的工具。提供對Google Analytics的審計和24/7監控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析監測和審計，以提高轉換率。

previous.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.
previous.title: Tellspin - Automatic user group / @mention rotation in Slack

localize.description: 别再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，为什么我们要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin让你轻松为Slack创建日程/升级策略。通过内置的用户组/@mentions与你的团队成员分担负荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自动轮流使用用户组/@mention

localize.description: 別再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，爲什麼我們要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin讓你輕鬆爲Slack創建日程/升級策略。通過內置的用戶組/@mentions與你的團隊成員分擔負荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自動輪流使用用戶組/@mention

next.excerpt: Built from the ground up for performance. A powerful AI engine for generating copy to drive conversions. Generate or improve your own ideas for ads, social posts, email subject lines and landing pages.
next.title: Anyword - Write your copy with an AI trained on $250M of ads

localize.description: 从底层构建的性能。强大的人工智能引擎，用于生成文案以促进转化。生成或改进您自己的广告、社交帖子、电子邮件主题行和登陆页面的想法。
localize.tagline: 用受过2.5亿美元广告训练的人工智能来写你的文案。
